text: IT is mid-morning on a Dublin Sunday. The streets are tranquilly sunny and still, for the town is at Mass. Most of it. In the front room of a house in Anglesey-road is a congregation who never actually got to church, but who are gathered with devotion around Brendan Behan and a brandy bottle.
handwritten_text: IT is mid-morning on a Dublin Sunday. The streets are tranquilly sunny and still, for the town is at Mass. Most of it. In the front room of a house in Anglesey-road is a congregation who never actually got to church, but who are gathered with devotion around Brendan Behan and a brandy bottle.
